00067 #include <config.h>
00068 #include <Lcode/r_regproto.h>
00069 #include "l_schedule.h"
00070 
00071 int             Lsched_use_register_pressure_heuristic = 0;
00072 int             Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold = 75 /* % */;
00073 int             Lsched_regpres_heuristic = 0;
00074 int             Lregpres_problem = 0;
00075 
00076 int             num_virt_reg;
00077 Vreg            *virt_reg = NULL;
00078 CB_REG_INFO     preg_info;
00079 CB_REG_INFO     ireg_info;
00080 CB_REG_INFO     freg_info;
00081 CB_REG_INFO     dreg_info;
00082 
00083 #define         CALLEE  0
00084 #define         CALLER  1
00085 /******************************************************************************\
00086  *
00087  *
00088  *
00089 \******************************************************************************/
00090 
00091 void Lregpres_compute_benefit(Sched_Info *sinfo)
00092 {
00093     sinfo->benefit = 
00094         (sinfo->kill_set.p + sinfo->kill_set.i + 
00095          sinfo->kill_set.f + sinfo->kill_set.d) - 
00096         (sinfo->def_set.p + sinfo->def_set.i + 
00097          sinfo->def_set.f + sinfo->def_set.d);
00098 }
00099 
00100 int Lregpres_inc_current (int ctype, int count)
00101 {
00102     switch (ctype)
00103     {
00104         case L_CTYPE_INT:
00105             preg_info.current_reg += (count * ireg_info.change.p);
00106             ireg_info.current_reg += (count * ireg_info.change.i);
00107             freg_info.current_reg += (count * ireg_info.change.f);
00108             dreg_info.current_reg += (count * ireg_info.change.d);
00109             break;
00110         
00111         case L_CTYPE_FLOAT:
00112             preg_info.current_reg += (count * freg_info.change.p);
00113             ireg_info.current_reg += (count * freg_info.change.i);
00114             freg_info.current_reg += (count * freg_info.change.f);
00115             dreg_info.current_reg += (count * freg_info.change.d);
00116             break;
00117         
00118         case L_CTYPE_DOUBLE:
00119             preg_info.current_reg += (count * dreg_info.change.p);
00120             ireg_info.current_reg += (count * dreg_info.change.i);
00121             freg_info.current_reg += (count * dreg_info.change.f);
00122             dreg_info.current_reg += (count * dreg_info.change.d);
00123             break;
00124         
00125         case L_CTYPE_PREDICATE:
00126             preg_info.current_reg += (count * preg_info.change.p);
00127             ireg_info.current_reg += (count * preg_info.change.i);
00128             freg_info.current_reg += (count * preg_info.change.f);
00129             dreg_info.current_reg += (count * preg_info.change.d);
00130             break;
00131 
00132         default:
00133             L_punt ("Lregpres_update_current: invalid ctype of %d\n", ctype);
00134     }   
00135 
00136     Lregpres_problem = ( (preg_info.current_reg > preg_info.threshhold) |
00137                          (ireg_info.current_reg > ireg_info.threshhold) |
00138                          (freg_info.current_reg > freg_info.threshhold) |
00139                          (dreg_info.current_reg > dreg_info.threshhold) );
00140 
00141     return Lregpres_problem;
00142 }
00143 
00144 int Lregpres_dec_current (int ctype, int count)
00145 {
00146     switch (ctype)
00147     {
00148         case L_CTYPE_INT:
00149             preg_info.current_reg -= (count * ireg_info.change.p);
00150             ireg_info.current_reg -= (count * ireg_info.change.i);
00151             freg_info.current_reg -= (count * ireg_info.change.f);
00152             dreg_info.current_reg -= (count * ireg_info.change.d);
00153             break;
00154         
00155         case L_CTYPE_FLOAT:
00156             preg_info.current_reg -= (count * freg_info.change.p);
00157             ireg_info.current_reg -= (count * freg_info.change.i);
00158             freg_info.current_reg -= (count * freg_info.change.f);
00159             dreg_info.current_reg -= (count * freg_info.change.d);
00160             break;
00161         
00162         case L_CTYPE_DOUBLE:
00163             preg_info.current_reg -= (count * dreg_info.change.p);
00164             ireg_info.current_reg -= (count * dreg_info.change.i);
00165             freg_info.current_reg -= (count * dreg_info.change.f);
00166             dreg_info.current_reg -= (count * dreg_info.change.d);
00167             break;
00168         
00169         case L_CTYPE_PREDICATE:
00170             preg_info.current_reg -= (count * preg_info.change.p);
00171             ireg_info.current_reg -= (count * preg_info.change.i);
00172             freg_info.current_reg -= (count * preg_info.change.f);
00173             dreg_info.current_reg -= (count * preg_info.change.d);
00174             break;
00175 
00176         default:
00177             L_punt ("Lregpres_update_current: invalid ctype of %d\n", ctype);
00178     }   
00179 
00180     Lregpres_problem = ( (preg_info.current_reg > preg_info.threshhold) |
00181                          (ireg_info.current_reg > ireg_info.threshhold) |
00182                          (freg_info.current_reg > freg_info.threshhold) |
00183                          (dreg_info.current_reg > dreg_info.threshhold) );
00184 
00185     return Lregpres_problem;
00186 }
00187 
00188 void Lregpres_inc_set(Regtypes *set, int ctype)
00189 {
00190     switch (ctype)
00191     {
00192         case L_CTYPE_INT:
00193             set->p += ireg_info.change.p;
00194             set->i += ireg_info.change.i;
00195             set->f += ireg_info.change.f;
00196             set->d += ireg_info.change.d;
00197             break;
00198         
00199         case L_CTYPE_FLOAT:
00200             set->p += freg_info.change.p;
00201             set->i += freg_info.change.i;
00202             set->f += freg_info.change.f;
00203             set->d += freg_info.change.d;
00204             break;
00205         
00206         case L_CTYPE_DOUBLE:
00207             set->p += dreg_info.change.p;
00208             set->i += dreg_info.change.i;
00209             set->f += dreg_info.change.f;
00210             set->d += dreg_info.change.d;
00211             break;
00212         
00213         case L_CTYPE_PREDICATE:
00214             set->p += preg_info.change.p;
00215             set->i += preg_info.change.i;
00216             set->f += preg_info.change.f;
00217             set->d += preg_info.change.d;
00218             break;
00219 
00220         default:
00221             L_punt ("Lregpres_inc_set: invalid ctype of %d\n", ctype);
00222     }   
00223 }
00224 
00225 void Lregpres_add_virt_reg_use (Sched_Info *sinfo, int reg_num)
00226 {
00227     L_enqueue (virt_reg[reg_num].use_queue, sinfo); 
00228 }
00229 
00230 /******************************************************************************\
00231  *
00232  *
00233  *
00234 \******************************************************************************/
00235 
00236 void Lregpres_init_func(L_Func *fn)
00237 {
00238     L_Cb        *cb;
00239     L_Oper      *oper;
00240     int         i, reg_num;
00241 
00242     if (!Lsched_use_register_pressure_heuristic)
00243     {
00244         Lsched_regpres_heuristic = 0;
00245         return;
00246     }
00247     else
00248         Lsched_regpres_heuristic = 1;
00249 
00250     /*
00251      * Initialize information for register pressure heuristic
00252      *
00253      * Currently this is hardcoded for hp architecture.  This
00254      * will be changed as soon as mdes is modified to provide
00255      * this information.
00256      *
00257      * Given that x is the bank being initialized.
00258      *
00259      * if ( there is an overlap )
00260      *     [pifd]_change = sizeof(x)/sizeof([pifd]);
00261      * else
00262      *     [pifd]_change = 0.0;
00263      #
00264      */
00265     preg_info.caller_reg = (float) R_number_of_registers (L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, CALLER, FALSE);
00266     preg_info.caller_thresh = (float) ceil( (double) (preg_info.caller_reg *
00267         (float) Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold / 100.0) );
00268     preg_info.callee_reg = (float) R_number_of_registers (L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, CALLER, FALSE);
00269     preg_info.callee_thresh = (float) ceil( (double) (preg_info.callee_reg *
00270         (float) Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold / 100.0) );
00271     preg_info.size = (float) R_size_of_register (L_CTYPE_PREDICATE);
00272 
00273     ireg_info.caller_reg = (float) R_number_of_registers (L_CTYPE_INT, CALLER, TRUE);
00274     ireg_info.caller_thresh = (float) ceil( (double) (ireg_info.caller_reg *
00275         (float) Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold / 100.0) );
00276     ireg_info.callee_reg = (float) R_number_of_registers (L_CTYPE_INT, CALLEE, TRUE);
00277     ireg_info.callee_thresh = (float) ceil( (double) (ireg_info.callee_reg *
00278         (float) Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold / 100.0) );
00279     ireg_info.size = (float) R_size_of_register (L_CTYPE_INT);
00280 
00281     freg_info.caller_reg = (float) R_number_of_registers (L_CTYPE_FLOAT, CALLER, TRUE);
00282     freg_info.caller_thresh = (float) ceil( (double) (freg_info.caller_reg *
00283         (float) Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold / 100.0) );
00284     freg_info.callee_reg = (float) R_number_of_registers (L_CTYPE_FLOAT, CALLEE, TRUE);
00285     freg_info.callee_thresh = (float) ceil( (double) (ireg_info.callee_reg *
00286         (float) Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold / 100.0) );
00287     freg_info.size = (float) R_size_of_register (L_CTYPE_FLOAT);
00288 
00289     dreg_info.caller_reg = (float) R_number_of_registers (L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, CALLER, TRUE);
00290     dreg_info.caller_thresh = (float) ceil( (double) (dreg_info.caller_reg *
00291         (float) Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold / 100.0) );
00292     dreg_info.callee_reg = (float) R_number_of_registers (L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, CALLEE, TRUE);
00293     dreg_info.callee_thresh = (float) ceil( (double) (dreg_info.callee_reg *
00294         (float) Lsched_register_pressure_threshhold / 100.0) );
00295     dreg_info.size = (float) R_size_of_register (L_CTYPE_DOUBLE);
00296 
00297 
00298     /* Initialize predicate overlap sizes */
00299     preg_info.change.p = 1.0;           /* Always overlaps with itself */
00300 
00301     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, L_CTYPE_INT))
00302         preg_info.change.i = preg_info.size / ireg_info.size;
00303     else
00304         preg_info.change.i = 0.0;
00305 
00306     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, L_CTYPE_FLOAT))
00307         preg_info.change.f = preg_info.size / freg_info.size;
00308     else
00309         preg_info.change.f = 0.0;
00310 
00311     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, L_CTYPE_DOUBLE))
00312         preg_info.change.d = preg_info.size / dreg_info.size;
00313     else
00314         preg_info.change.d = 0.0;
00315 
00316     /* Initialize integer overlap sizes */
00317     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_INT, L_CTYPE_PREDICATE))
00318         ireg_info.change.p = ireg_info.size / preg_info.size;
00319     else
00320         ireg_info.change.p = 0.0;
00321 
00322     ireg_info.change.i = 1.0;           /* Always overlaps with itself */
00323 
00324     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_INT, L_CTYPE_FLOAT))
00325         ireg_info.change.f = ireg_info.size / freg_info.size;
00326     else
00327         ireg_info.change.f = 0.0;
00328 
00329     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_INT, L_CTYPE_DOUBLE))
00330         ireg_info.change.d = ireg_info.size / dreg_info.size;
00331     else
00332         ireg_info.change.d = 0.0;
00333 
00334     /* Initialize float overlap sizes */
00335     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_FLOAT, L_CTYPE_PREDICATE))
00336         freg_info.change.p = freg_info.size / preg_info.size;
00337     else
00338         freg_info.change.p = 0.0;
00339 
00340     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_FLOAT, L_CTYPE_INT))
00341         freg_info.change.i = freg_info.size / ireg_info.size;
00342     else
00343         freg_info.change.i = 0.0;
00344 
00345     freg_info.change.f = 1.0;           /* Always overlaps with itself */
00346 
00347     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_FLOAT, L_CTYPE_DOUBLE))
00348         freg_info.change.d = freg_info.size / dreg_info.size;
00349     else
00350         freg_info.change.d = 0.0;
00351 
00352     /* Initialize double overlap sizes */
00353     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, L_CTYPE_PREDICATE))
00354         dreg_info.change.p = dreg_info.size / preg_info.size;
00355     else
00356         dreg_info.change.p = 0.0;
00357 
00358     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, L_CTYPE_INT))
00359         dreg_info.change.i = dreg_info.size / ireg_info.size;
00360     else
00361         dreg_info.change.i = 0.0;
00362 
00363     if (R_register_overlap (L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, L_CTYPE_FLOAT))
00364         dreg_info.change.f = dreg_info.size / freg_info.size;
00365     else
00366         dreg_info.change.f = 0.0;
00367 
00368     dreg_info.change.d = 1.0;           /* Always overlaps with itself */
00369 
00370 
00371     /* Initialize virtual registers for function */
00372     num_virt_reg = fn->max_reg_id;
00373     virt_reg = (Vreg *) calloc(num_virt_reg+1, sizeof (Vreg));
00374 
00375     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb=cb->next_cb)
00376     {
00377         for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper=oper->next_op)
00378         {
00379             for (i=0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
00380             {
00381                 if (L_is_register(oper->src[i])) 
00382                 {
00383                     reg_num = oper->src[i]->value.r;
00384 
00385                     if (virt_reg[reg_num].use_queue==NULL)
00386                     {
00387                         virt_reg[reg_num].use_queue = 
00388                             L_create_queue("virt_reg", reg_num);
00389                         virt_reg[reg_num].ctype = L_return_old_ctype(oper->src[i]);
00390                     }
00391                 }
00392             }
00393 
00394             for (i=0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
00395             {
00396                 if (L_is_register(oper->dest[i])) 
00397                 {
00398                     reg_num = oper->dest[i]->value.r;
00399 
00400                     if (virt_reg[reg_num].use_queue==NULL)
00401                     {
00402                         virt_reg[reg_num].use_queue = 
00403                             L_create_queue("virt_reg", reg_num);
00404                         virt_reg[reg_num].ctype = L_return_old_ctype(oper->dest[i]);
00405                     }
00406                 }
00407             }
00408         }
00409     }
00410 }
00411 
00412 void Lregpres_deinit_func(L_Func *fn)
00413 {
00414     int i;
00415 
00416     if (!Lsched_regpres_heuristic) return;
00417 
00418     for (i=0; i<num_virt_reg; i++)
00419     {
00420         if (virt_reg[i].use_queue != NULL)
00421             L_delete_queue (virt_reg[i].use_queue);
00422     }
00423 
00424     free (virt_reg);
00425 
00426     Lsched_regpres_heuristic = 0;
00427 }
00428 
00429 void Lregpres_init_cb(L_Cb *cb)
00430 {
00431     L_Oper      *oper;
00432     Squeue      *queue;
00433     Sched_Info  *sinfo, *kill_sinfo;
00434     int         i, *reg, reg_cnt, size, *buf, reg_num,
00435                 jsr_found=0;
00436     Set         in_set, out_set, kill_set, taken_set, fall_thru_set;
00437 
00438     if (!Lsched_regpres_heuristic) return;
00439 
00440     Lregpres_problem = 0;
00441     preg_info.current_reg = 0.0;
00442     ireg_info.current_reg = 0.0;
00443     freg_info.current_reg = 0.0;
00444     dreg_info.current_reg = 0.0;
00445 
00446     for (i=0; i<num_virt_reg; i++)
00447         virt_reg[i].live_in_fall_thru_path = 0;
00448 
00449     /* 
00450      * Initialize register pressure for cb based upon the live-in of
00451      * the cb 
00452      */
00453     in_set = L_get_cb_IN_set(cb); 
00454     buf = (int *) malloc (sizeof(int) * Set_size(in_set));
00455     size = Set_2array (in_set, buf);
00456     for (i=0; i<size; i++)
00457     {
00458         if (L_IS_MAPPED_REG(buf[i]))
00459             Lregpres_inc_current (virt_reg[L_UNMAP_REG(buf[i])].ctype, 1);
00460     }
00461     free(buf);
00462 
00463     /*
00464      * We mark all registers that are live in the fall-thru path
00465      * to prevent the register from being incorrectly killed.
00466      */
00467     if (!IS_UCOND_BRANCH(cb->last_op->proc_opc) ||
00468         (L_is_predicated(cb->last_op) && !L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags,
00469                                                 L_CB_HYPERBLOCK_NO_FALLTHRU)))
00470     {
00471         out_set = L_get_oper_OUT_set(cb, cb->last_op, FALL_THRU_PATH); 
00472         buf = (int *) malloc (sizeof(int) * Set_size(out_set));
00473         size = Set_2array (out_set, buf);
00474         for (i=0; i<size; i++)
00475         {
00476             if (L_IS_MAPPED_REG(buf[i]))
00477                 virt_reg[L_UNMAP_REG(buf[i])].live_in_fall_thru_path = 1;
00478         }
00479         free(buf);
00480     }
00481 
00482     /*
00483      * Build use and def sets for all registers within the cb.
00484      */
00485     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
00486     {
00487         if (oper->ext==NULL) continue;
00488 
00489         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
00490 
00491         if (IS_JSR(sinfo->proc_opc)) jsr_found = 1;
00492 
00493         /* 
00494          * Any register that is in the taken path of the branch but not in
00495          * the fall-thru path of the branch is added to the virtual register
00496          * count to support the dynamic kill sets.  We must also keep track
00497          * of these registers so that we can appropriately mark any last
00498          * use after a branch as the killing instruction.
00499          */
00500         if (IS_BRANCH(sinfo->proc_opc))
00501         {
00502             taken_set = L_get_oper_OUT_set(cb, oper, TAKEN_PATH); 
00503             size = Set_size(taken_set);
00504             fall_thru_set = L_get_oper_OUT_set(cb, oper, FALL_THRU_PATH); 
00505             size = Set_size(fall_thru_set);
00506             kill_set = Set_subtract(taken_set, fall_thru_set);
00507             size = Set_size(kill_set);
00508             buf = (int *) malloc (sizeof(int) * Set_size(kill_set));
00509             size = Set_2array(kill_set, buf);
00510 
00511             reg_cnt=0;
00512             for (i=0; i<size; i++)
00513                 if (L_IS_MAPPED_REG(buf[i])) reg_cnt++;
00514 
00515             sinfo->branch_kill_set = reg =
00516                 (int *) malloc (sizeof(int) * reg_cnt);
00517             sinfo->branch_kill_set_size = reg_cnt; 
00518 
00519             reg_cnt = 0;
00520             for (i=0; i<size; i++)
00521             {
00522                 if (L_IS_MAPPED_REG(buf[i]))
00523                 {
00524                     reg_num = L_UNMAP_REG(buf[i]);
00525                     reg[reg_cnt++] = reg_num;
00526                     Lregpres_add_virt_reg_use (sinfo, reg_num);
00527                 }
00528             }
00529             free(buf);
00530         }
00531 
00532         /* Initialize virtual register to support dynamic kill set */
00533         for (i=0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
00534         { 
00535             if (L_is_register(oper->src[i])) 
00536             {
00537                 reg_num = oper->src[i]->value.r;
00538                 Lregpres_add_virt_reg_use (sinfo, reg_num);
00539             }
00540         }
00541 
00542         /* Initialize the set of registers defined by this instruction */
00543         for (i=0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
00544         {
00545             if (L_is_register(oper->dest[i]))
00546             {
00547                 Lregpres_inc_set(&sinfo->def_set, L_return_old_ctype(oper->dest[i]));
00548             }
00549         }
00550     }
00551 
00552     /* Initialize the benefits for each instruction */
00553     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op)
00554         if (oper->ext!=NULL)
00555             Lregpres_compute_benefit(SCHED_INFO(oper));
00556      
00557 
00558     /* 
00559      * Mark any registers that are dead after only one use for 
00560      * appropriate initialization for the cb.
00561      */
00562     for (i=0; i<num_virt_reg; i++)
00563     {
00564         queue = virt_reg[i].use_queue;
00565 
00566         if (!queue) continue;
00567 
00568         if ((L_get_queue_size(queue) == 1) && !virt_reg[i].live_in_fall_thru_path)
00569         {
00570             kill_sinfo = L_get_queue_head (queue);
00571             Lregpres_inc_set(&kill_sinfo->kill_set, virt_reg[i].ctype);
00572             Lregpres_compute_benefit(kill_sinfo);
00573         }
00574     }
00575 
00576     if (jsr_found)
00577     {
00578         preg_info.threshhold = preg_info.caller_thresh + preg_info.callee_thresh;
00579         ireg_info.threshhold = ireg_info.caller_thresh + ireg_info.callee_thresh;
00580         freg_info.threshhold = freg_info.caller_thresh + freg_info.callee_thresh;
00581         dreg_info.threshhold = dreg_info.caller_thresh + dreg_info.callee_thresh;
00582     }
00583     else
00584     {
00585         preg_info.threshhold = preg_info.caller_thresh;
00586         ireg_info.threshhold = ireg_info.caller_thresh;
00587         freg_info.threshhold = freg_info.caller_thresh;
00588         dreg_info.threshhold = dreg_info.caller_thresh;
00589     }
00590 }
00591 
00592 /******************************************************************************\
00593  *
00594  *
00595  *
00596 \******************************************************************************/
00597 
00598 void L_init_ready_queue()
00599 {
00600     L_reset_queue_current(priority_ready_queue);
00601 
00602     if (Lsched_regpres_heuristic)
00603         L_reset_queue_current(regpres_ready_queue);
00604 }
00605 
00606 Sched_Info* L_get_next_entry()
00607 {
00608     if (Lsched_regpres_heuristic && Lregpres_problem &&
00609         L_get_queue_size(regpres_ready_queue) /* &&
00610         ((L_get_queue_head (regpres_ready_queue))->benefit >= 0.0) */)
00611         return L_get_queue_next_entry(regpres_ready_queue);
00612     else
00613         return L_get_queue_next_entry(priority_ready_queue);
00614 }
00615 
00616 void L_insert_entry(Sched_Info *sinfo)
00617 {
00618     float key2=0.0;
00619 
00620     if (Lsched_regpres_heuristic)
00621         L_enqueue_regpres (regpres_ready_queue, sinfo, sinfo->benefit, 
00622             sinfo->priority);
00623 
00624     if (Lsched_use_fan_out) key2 = (float)sinfo->dep_info->n_output_dep;
00625 
00626     L_enqueue_max_to_min_2 (priority_ready_queue, sinfo, sinfo->priority,
00627         key2); 
00628 }
00629 
00630 void L_update_virt_reg (Sched_Info *sinfo)
00631 {
00632     Squeue      *queue;
00633     Sched_Info  *kill_sinfo;
00634     L_Oper      *oper;
00635     int         i, reg;
00636 
00637     if (!Lsched_regpres_heuristic) return;
00638 
00639     /* Decrement the current register approximations  by the kill set */
00640     Lregpres_dec_current (L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, sinfo->kill_set.p);
00641     Lregpres_dec_current (L_CTYPE_INT, sinfo->kill_set.i);
00642     Lregpres_dec_current (L_CTYPE_FLOAT, sinfo->kill_set.f);
00643     Lregpres_dec_current (L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, sinfo->kill_set.d);
00644 
00645     /* Increment the current register approximations by the def set */
00646     Lregpres_inc_current (L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, sinfo->def_set.p);
00647     Lregpres_inc_current (L_CTYPE_INT, sinfo->def_set.i);
00648     Lregpres_inc_current (L_CTYPE_FLOAT, sinfo->def_set.f);
00649     Lregpres_inc_current (L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, sinfo->def_set.d);
00650 
00651     /* 
00652      * Update kill sets for instructions that may be the last use
00653      * of a register in the taken path of the branch.
00654      */
00655     if (IS_BRANCH(sinfo->proc_opc))
00656     {
00657         for (i=0; i<sinfo->branch_kill_set_size; i++)
00658         {
00659             reg = sinfo->branch_kill_set[i];
00660             queue = virt_reg[reg].use_queue;
00661 
00662             L_dequeue(queue, sinfo);
00663 
00664             if ((L_get_queue_size(queue) == 1) && !virt_reg[reg].live_in_fall_thru_path)
00665             {
00666                 kill_sinfo = L_get_queue_head (queue);
00667                 Lregpres_inc_set(&kill_sinfo->kill_set, virt_reg[reg].ctype);
00668                 Lregpres_compute_benefit(kill_sinfo);
00669                 if (L_in_queue(regpres_ready_queue, kill_sinfo))
00670                 {
00671                     L_dequeue(regpres_ready_queue, kill_sinfo);
00672                     L_enqueue_regpres (regpres_ready_queue, kill_sinfo,
00673                         kill_sinfo->benefit, kill_sinfo->priority);
00674                 }
00675             }
00676         }
00677     }
00678 
00679     oper = sinfo->oper;
00680 
00681     for (i=0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
00682     { 
00683         if (L_is_register(oper->src[i])) 
00684         {
00685             reg = oper->src[i]->value.r;
00686             queue = virt_reg[reg].use_queue;
00687 
00688             L_dequeue(queue, sinfo);
00689 
00690             if ((L_get_queue_size(queue) == 1) && !virt_reg[reg].live_in_fall_thru_path)
00691             {
00692                 kill_sinfo = L_get_queue_head (queue);
00693                 Lregpres_inc_set(&kill_sinfo->kill_set, virt_reg[reg].ctype);
00694                 Lregpres_compute_benefit(kill_sinfo);
00695                 if (L_in_queue(regpres_ready_queue, kill_sinfo))
00696                 {
00697                     L_dequeue(regpres_ready_queue, kill_sinfo);
00698                     L_enqueue_regpres (regpres_ready_queue, kill_sinfo,
00699                         kill_sinfo->benefit, kill_sinfo->priority);
00700                 }
00701             }
00702         }
00703     }
00704 }
